description_zh: 分享独立开发者的变现思路与案例
description_en: Share the monetization ideas and cases of independent developers.
rating_zh: 分享独立开发、产品变现相关内容。支持推荐或自荐。目前周刊已不再维护，但还是可以在issue中投稿，可能会被其他投稿的同行关注到。
rating_en: Share content related to independent development and product monetization. Recommendations and self - promotions are welcome. Currently, the weekly newsletter is no longer maintained, but you can still submit contributions in the issues section, which may attract the attention of other contributing peers.
